flavor: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

foreign_names.flavor: Der Klang jedes einzelnen verdrehten Geheimnisses verleitet dich, mehr hören zu wollen.
foreign_names.name: Verkünder des Untergangs
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend, verursacht Trampelschaden
Bezahle 2 Lebenspunkte: Überwachen 2. (Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Lege dann eine beliebige Anzahl davon auf deinen Friedhof und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben auf deine Bibliothek.)

foreign_names.flavor: El sonido de cada secreto retorcido te tienta a oír otro.
foreign_names.name: Susurrador de la fatalidad
foreign_names.text:
Vuela, arrolla.
Pagar 2 vidas: Escruta 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier cantidad de ellas en tu cementerio y el resto en la parte superior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.)

foreign_names.flavor: Le son de chaque secret retors vous donne envie d'en entendre un autre.
foreign_names.name: Chuchoteur de mort
foreign_names.text:
Vol, piétinement
Payez 2 points de vie : Surveillez 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, puis mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles dans votre cimetière et le reste au-dessus de votre bibliothèque dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreign_names.flavor: Il suono di ogni torbido segreto ti tenta ad ascoltarne un altro.
foreign_names.name: Sussurratore del Fato
foreign_names.text:
Volare, travolgere
Paga 2 punti vita: Sorveglia 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero nel tuo cimitero e le altre in cima al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.)

foreign_names.flavor: 奇妙な秘密の音は、もっと聞きたいという気持ちを呼び起こす。
foreign_names.name: 破滅を囁くもの
foreign_names.text:
飛行、トランプル
２点のライフを支払う：諜報２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚見て、そのうちの望む枚数をあなたの墓地に、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に望む順番で置く。）

foreign_names.flavor: 비틀린 비밀들의 소리 하나하나가 당신에게 또다른 것을 들으라고 유혹한다.
foreign_names.name: 파멸을 속삭이는 자
foreign_names.text:
비행, 돌진
생명 2점을 지불한다: 감시 2를 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 본 후, 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 무덤에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓는다.)

foreign_names.flavor: O som de cada segredo sórdido traz a tentação de ouvir outro.
foreign_names.name: Sussurrador da Ruína
foreign_names.text:
Voar, atropelar
Pague 2 pontos de vida: Use vigiar 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles em seu cemitério e o restante no topo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.)

foreign_names.flavor: Звучание каждой извращенной тайны соблазняет тебя услышать новую.
foreign_names.name: Шепчущая Погибель
foreign_names.text:
Полет, Пробивной удар
Заплатите 2 жизни: используйте Слежку 2. (Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них на ваше кладбище, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)

foreign_names.flavor: 每一则扭曲秘密的声音都诱惑着你再听一则。
foreign_names.name: 毁灭低语魔
foreign_names.text:
飞行，践踏
支付2点生命：刺探2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

foreign_names.flavor: 每一則扭曲秘密的聲音都誘惑著你再聽一則。
foreign_names.name: 毀滅低語魔
foreign_names.text:
飛行，踐踏
支付2點生命：刺探2。（檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌，然後將其中任意數量的牌置入你的墳墓場，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫頂。）

name: Doom Whisperer
original_text: Flying, trample Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

rulings.text: When you surveil, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards into your graveyard, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them into your graveyard.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, you’ll surveil last. For others, you’ll surveil and then perform other actions.

text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)
